special_text:
Aurora [i](At your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. If your aurora has three or more colors, it gains vigilance, trample and haste until end of turn.
[-2]: Choose a basic land type. Create a tapped basic land token with that type.
[-2]: Create a 0/0 green Plant creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of colors in your aurora.
